hopobject.name: MediaCenter
hopobject.body: A stand alone media center device connected to a tv (hdtv), where a mass storage device can be plugged in, to watch (hd-)movies or to listen music. Using a lan/internet connection youtube content (and things like that) can be watched and content from the home network can be played.
hopobject.shortdesc: A (portable) stand-alone media center device connected to a (hd)tv
